name: places/ChIJxWnvdvPzwokRSwv8gWaxgMg
adrFormatAddress: 4036 10th Ave #1146, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text:
My experience has been terrible! I have to say the car I bought is worth the price I paid for BUT these people are THIEVES! that's what you call someone that's holding back your money with no valid reason, right?

I paid $300 in advance to have simple things fixed in the car I bought and these people have kept my money, they haven't provided a solution. Every time I call them, they say they ordered the piece to get my car fixed but "it's still on the way", and it's been 2 months now. I dont want any altercation with anyone so Im going to let them keep my $300. Im sure that they will lose more money than that in the long run for providing terrible service. People will find out how bad your service is and guess what...

originalText.text: Maybe I was lucky.  I bought a car from him that was very good, $3000 with an actual value of $4000.  Then I bought a Honda for $3800 worth $5000 that I now still have after 5 years with no problem that resales for $3000. I do know mechanics. Never buy a car that is not at least $1000 less than retail. That $1000+ is your own insurance.  It's naive to think a dealer will spend a lot.  Those that do just charge a lot more to begin with.

originalText.text:
I purchased a used Lexus from this guy.
I agree with another review. Literally all his cars are water damaged.

The Lexus was rotted all around the bottom of the car. The pipes and everything and had high milage. I naively still bought it not doing thorough research.

It broke down on me 2 days later and left me stuck on the street twice. Because of the battery. Which he changed but took him a week to do that and that battery got messed up like 3 months after anyways.

Point is, I put a lot of money into repairing the car. And it just gave me lots of headaches...
Make sure you go with a mechanic or someone that knows about cars to inspect it before hand. Make sure everything works.
One of my windows didn't work either.

Or better yet, save your time and money and take your business elsewhere if you wanna save yourself the headache!!

This guy is definitely sneaky con artists who will try to swivel you into it........

Good luck!!!

originalText.text: Don’t waste your time going to this place. Horrible costumer service. Owner is always busy and never is direct. They guarantee you one thing and it’s always the complete opposite. In order to give you the car and keys with papers, it is a run around. Tries to sell cars that do not pass inspection. Expects you to pay for the fixing of the car with your downpayment. How are you selling me a car that needs fixing and are guaranteeing that everything is up to date. The workers don’t know what they are doing. They are not responsible or professional, It’s like everything is a mystery. They are receiving 1 start but in reality it should be negative 10 stars. That is how bad the service is at this place.

originalText.text:
i agree with the rest of the reviews. this man sells horrible cars. it doesnt make sense to buy a car for 7000 dollars and has 230,000 miles. all those cars are in horrible conditions. he also does not give back your money he makes up a thousand excuses and runs around the bush. he has a guy who also works there and he doesnt speak clear. he will make it sound like everything is nice and cool until u give them the money. then it becomes an issue to get it back. they speak to you with a horrible attitude and sometimes leaves u waiting a long time to attend you. most of there cars have horrible paint jobs and they want to much money for them. cars are super dirty inside and their keys are messed up.DO NOT DO ANY BUSINESS THERE DONT DO IT. TRUST THE REVIEW ITS THE TRUTH. you can get a car 10 times better on craigslist probably and not there. just dont do it.

no haga negocio con ellos. los carros son horrible y ellos son horrible tambien. los carros tienen las pintura mala y quieren mucho dinero con alta millas. cuando le das el dinero se te enconden y duran mucho para darle su dinero para atras
